ComicInfo.Title: Fury of the Firelord!; "...Till Death Do Us Part!"
ComicInfo.Summary:
Fury of the Firelord!: When Firelord sees the remains of Gabriel on TV he travels to New York to confront Thor over his destruction of his friend. The origins of Gabriel and Firelord are revealed.
"...Till Death Do Us Part!": The death of Nanna releases Balder from his oath to Karnilla.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:34:56. [Issue ID 35287]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
